ranked_sentences.sentence: Atlanta manager Brian Snitker told Harris that his catch was the 'catch of the year' and mentioned they would be watching it for the next 24 hours.
Philadelphia manager Rob Thomson praised Harris' catch, calling it one of the best catches ever seen in the game.
Max Fried, the Braves pitcher, expressed awe at Harris' catch, calling it a very special play and probably the best catch he has ever had behind him.
Atlanta manager Brian Snitker called Michael Harris II's catch 'probably the catch of the year'.
Zack Wheeler expressed pride in his 100th victory, highlighting the hard work and belief in himself and his teams.
Phillies manager Rob Thomson praised Wheeler's performance, noting he was 'locked in tonight'.
Bryce Harper acknowledged the Braves as a strong team and expressed optimism for the remaining games in the series.
Phillies manager Rob Thomson commented on the mislocation of pitches that led to home runs.
Orlando Arcia reflected on the boos from the crowd.
